title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Teacher-Student Interaction and Emotional Impact in Online Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three techniques to enhance student engagement using verbal immediacy in online classes.
Learners can develop a three-stage instructional design strategy to strengthen teachers' online presence in real-time video environments.
Learners can validate interaction designs considering students' emotional responses during math concept explanations through at least two formative assessments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
